CustomField.description: Returns True if Disbursal date is lesser than 6 months from today.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Case__r.Asset.Last_Disbursement_Date__c>= DATE(YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH(TODAY()) - 6, DAY(TODAY())), Case__r.Asset.Last_Disbursement_Date__c<= TODAY() ), true, false )
CustomField.label: Disbursal < 6?
